trans-unit.target: 用于比较值的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns distinct elements from a sequence by using a specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> 对值进行比较，返回序列中的非重复元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains distinct elements from the source sequence.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含源序列中的非重复元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Distinct%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> method returns an unordered sequence that contains no duplicate values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Distinct%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法返回未排序的序列，其中包含没有重复的值。

trans-unit.source: If c`omparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>, is used to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 如果`omparer`是`null`，默认的相等比较， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>，用于比较值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement an equality comparer that can be used in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Distinct%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现可在将相等比较器<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Distinct%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you implement this comparer, you can use a sequence of `Product` objects in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Distinct%2A> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 实现此比较器后，你可以使用的序列`Product`中的对象<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Distinct%2A>方法，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return an element from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中返回元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的从零开始的元素索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the element at a specified index in a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified position in the source sequence.
trans-unit.target: 源序列中指定位置处的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the type of `source` implements <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, that implementation is used to obtain the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 如果的一种`source`实现<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>，该实现用于获取指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method obtains the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法获取指定的元素。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception if `index` is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发异常，如果`index`超出范围。

trans-unit.source: To instead return a default value when the specified index is out of range, use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ElementAtOrDefault%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要改为返回默认值，指定的索引超出范围时，使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ElementAtOrDefault%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ElementAt%2A> to return an element at a specific position.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ElementAt%2A>以返回特定位置处的元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the number of elements in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零或大于等于 <paramref name="source" /> 中的元素数量。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return an element from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中返回元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的从零开始的元素索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the element at a specified index in a sequence or a default value if the index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中指定索引处的元素；如果索引超出范围，则返回默认值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />) if the index is outside the bounds of the source sequence; otherwise, the element at the specified position in the source sequence.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引超出源序列的边界，则为 <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />)；否则为源序列中指定位置处的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the type of `source` implements <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, that implementation is used to obtain the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 如果的一种`source`实现<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>，该实现用于获取指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method obtains the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法获取指定的元素。

trans-unit.source: The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 引用类型和可以为 null 的类型的默认值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ElementAtOrDefault%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ElementAtOrDefault%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses an index that is outside the bounds of the array.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用一个超出数组界限的数组的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type to assign to the type parameter of the returned generic <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 分配给返回的泛型 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 的类型参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that has the specified type argument.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有指定类型参数的空 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An empty <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose type argument is <paramref name="TResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个空 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其类型参数为 <paramref name="TResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Empty%60%601> method caches an empty sequence of type `TResult`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Empty%60%601>方法缓存类型的空序列`TResult`。

trans-unit.source: When the object it returns is enumerated, it yields no elements.
trans-unit.target: 当在枚举它所返回的对象时，它会生成任何元素。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, this method is useful for passing an empty sequence to a user-defined method that takes an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，此方法可用于向用户定义的方法传递空序列采用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>。

trans-unit.source: It can also be used to generate a neutral element for methods such as <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 它还可以使用来生成多个方法的非特定语言元素，如<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A>。

trans-unit.source: See the Example section for an example of this use of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Empty%60%601>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅示例部分以举例说明的这种用法<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Empty%60%601>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Empty%60%601> to generate an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Empty%60%601>生成一个空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a possible application of the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Empty%60%601> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了可能的应用程序<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Empty%60%601>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Aggregate%2A> method is applied to a collection of string arrays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Aggregate%2A>方法应用于字符串数组的集合。

trans-unit.source: The elements of each array in the collection are added to the resulting <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> only if that array contains four or more elements.
trans-unit.target: 集合中每个数组的元素添加到结果<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>仅当该数组包含四个或多个元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Empty%2A> is used to generate the seed value for <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Aggregate%2A> because if no array in the collection has four or more elements, only the empty sequence is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Empty%2A> 用于生成的种子值<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Aggregate%2A>因为如果在集合中的没有数组包含四个或多个元素，则返回空的序列。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set difference of two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 生成两个序列的差集。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose elements that are not also in <c>second</c> will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，将返回其不在第二个序列中的元素<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose elements that also occur in the first sequence will cause those elements to be removed from the returned sequence.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中的元素如果同时出现在第一个序列中，则将导致从返回的序列中移除这些元素。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set difference of two sequences by using the default equality comparer to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用默认的相等比较器对值进行比较，生成两个序列的差集。

trans-unit.source: A sequence that contains the set difference of the elements of two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 包含这两个序列的元素的差集的序列。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The set difference of two sets is defined as the members of the first set that do not appear in the second set.
trans-unit.target: 两个集的差集定义为不会出现在第二个集的第一组的成员。

trans-unit.source: This method returns those elements in `first` that do not appear in `second`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回这些元素在`first`，不显示在`second`。

trans-unit.source: It does not also return those elements in `second` that do not appear in `first`.
trans-unit.target: 它也不返回这些元素在`second`，不显示在`first`。

trans-unit.source: The default equality comparer, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>, is used to compare values of the types that implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 默认的相等比较， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>，用于比较的类型的实现值<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601>泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> methods for the type.
trans-unit.target: 若要比较自定义数据类型，你需要实现此接口并提供你自己<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>和<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Except%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method to compare two sequences of numbers and return elements that appear only in the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Except%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>仅在第一个序列中出现的方法来比较两个数字的序列并将其返回元素。

trans-unit.source: If you want to compare sequences of objects of some custom data type, you have to implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601> generic interface in a helperclass.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要比较的某些自定义数据类型的对象的序列，则必须实现<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601>helperclass 中的泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and provide <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义数据类型中实现此接口，并提供<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>和<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Except%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口后，你可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的对象<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Except%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="first" /> or <paramref name="second" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="first" /> 或 <paramref name="second" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose elements that are not also in <c>second</c> will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，将返回其不在第二个序列中的元素<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose elements that also occur in the first sequence will cause those elements to be removed from the returned sequence.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中的元素如果同时出现在第一个序列中，则将导致从返回的序列中移除这些元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 用于比较值的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set difference of two sequences by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> 对值进行比较，生成两个序列的差集。

trans-unit.source: A sequence that contains the set difference of the elements of two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 包含这两个序列的元素的差集的序列。

trans-unit.source: If c`omparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>, is used to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 如果`omparer`是`null`，默认的相等比较， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>，用于比较值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement an equality comparer that can be used in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Except%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现可在将相等比较器<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Except%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you implement this comparer, you can use sequences of `Product` objects in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Except%2A> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 实现此比较器后，你可以使用的序列`Product`中的对象<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Except%2A>方法，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="first" /> or <paramref name="second" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="first" /> 或 <paramref name="second" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first element of a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return the first element of.
trans-unit.target: 要返回其第一个元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first element of a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The first element in the specified sequence.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定序列中的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method throws an exception if `source` contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法引发异常，如果`source`不包含任何元素。

trans-unit.source: To instead return a default value when the source sequence is empty, use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要改为返回默认值的源序列为空时，使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to return the first element of an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>返回数组的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The source sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 源序列为空。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return an element from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中返回元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试每个元素是否满足条件的函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first element in a sequence that satisfies a specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中满足指定条件的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The first element in the sequence that passes the test in the specified predicate function.
trans-unit.target: 序列中通过指定谓词函数中的测试的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> method throws an exception if no matching element is found in `source`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>方法引发异常，如果在中不找到任何匹配元素`source`。

trans-unit.source: To instead return a default value when no matching element is found, use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要不找到任何匹配元素时返回默认值，使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> to return the first element of an array that satisfies a condition.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>返回数组中满足条件的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No element satisfies the condition in <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 元素均不满足 <paramref name="predicate" /> 中的条件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The source sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 源序列为空。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first element of a sequence, or a default value if no element is found.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中的第一个元素；如果未找到该元素，则返回默认值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return the first element of.
trans-unit.target: 要返回其第一个元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first element of a sequence, or a default value if the sequence contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中的第一个元素；如果序列中不包含任何元素，则返回默认值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />) if <paramref name="source" /> is empty; otherwise, the first element in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="source" /> 为空，则为 <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />)；否则为 <paramref name="source" /> 中的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 引用类型和可以为 null 的类型的默认值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault%2A> method does not provide a way to specify a default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault%2A>方法不提供任何方式来指定默认值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method as described in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定默认值以外`default(TSource)`，使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>示例部分中所述的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> on an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>上的空数组。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 有时的值`default(TSource)`不是你想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 而不是检查不需要的默认值的结果，然后将更改如有必要，你可以使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>方法，以指定你想要集合为空时使用的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Then, call <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to obtain the first element.
trans-unit.target: 然后，调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>若要获取的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric months is empty.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用这两种方法来获取默认值为 1，数字月份的集合是否为空。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead.
trans-unit.target: 由于输入一个整数默认值为 0，这不符合任何月份，必须指定默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query has finished executing.
trans-unit.target: 后执行完查询后，检查第一个结果变量为不需要的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The second result variable is obtained by using <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> to specify a default value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用来获取第二个结果变量<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>指定默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return an element from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中返回元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试每个元素是否满足条件的函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first element of the sequence that satisfies a condition or a default value if no such element is found.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中满足条件的第一个元素；如果未找到这样的元素，则返回默认值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />) if <paramref name="source" /> is empty or if no element passes the test specified by <paramref name="predicate" />; otherwise, the first element in <paramref name="source" /> that passes the test specified by <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="source" /> 为空或没有元素通过 <paramref name="predicate" /> 指定的测试，则为 <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />)，否则为 <paramref name="source" /> 中通过 <paramref name="predicate" /> 指定的测试的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 引用类型和可以为 null 的类型的默认值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> by passing in a predicate.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>通过传入一个谓词。

trans-unit.source: In the second call to the method, there is no element in the array that satisfies the condition.
trans-unit.target: 在对方法的第二个调用，满足条件的数组中没有任何元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Groups the elements of a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 对序列中的元素进行分组。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the key returned by <c>keySelector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的键的类型<c>对</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose elements to group.
trans-unit.target: 要对其元素进行分组的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the key for each element.
trans-unit.target: 用于提取每个元素的键的函数。

trans-unit.source: Groups the elements of a sequence according to a specified key selector function.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的键选择器函数对序列中的元素进行分组。

trans-unit.source: An <c>IEnumerable<IGrouping<TKey, TSource>></c> in C# or <c>IEnumerable(Of IGrouping(Of TKey, TSource))</c> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] where each <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" /> object contains a sequence of objects and a key.
trans-unit.target: C# 中的 <c>IEnumerable<IGrouping<TKey、TSource>></c>或 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 中的 <c>IEnumerable(Of IGrouping(Of TKey, TSource))</c>，其中的每个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" /> 对象均包含一个对象序列和键。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For examples of `GroupBy`, see the following topics.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例的`GroupBy`，请参阅以下主题。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%29> method returns a collection of <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objects, one for each distinct key that was encountered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%29>方法返回的集合<xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>对象，一个遇到每个非重复键。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> is an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> that also has a key associated with its elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>是<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>也具有一个其元素与关联的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objects are yielded in an order based on the order of the elements in `source` that produced the first key of each <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>对象都根据顺序中的元素的顺序生成`source`生成每个的第一个键<xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>。

trans-unit.source: Elements in a grouping are yielded in the order they appear in `source`.
trans-unit.target: 分组中的元素都在它们中出现的顺序生成`source`。

trans-unit.source: The default equality comparer <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A> is used to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 默认相等比较器<xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>用于比较键。

trans-unit.source: In query expression syntax, a `group by` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Group By Into` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在查询表达式语法中， `group by` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Group By Into`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information and usage examples, see [group clause](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md) and [Group By Clause](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息和用法示例，请参阅[group 子句](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md)和[组 By 子句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="keySelector" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="keySelector" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the key returned by <c>keySelector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的键的类型<c>对</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose elements to group.
trans-unit.target: 要对其元素进行分组的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the key for each element.
trans-unit.target: 用于提取每个元素的键的函数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 用于比较键的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Groups the elements of a sequence according to a specified key selector function and compares the keys by using a specified comparer.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的键选择器函数对序列中的元素进行分组，并使用指定的比较器对键进行比较。

trans-unit.source: An <c>IEnumerable<IGrouping<TKey, TSource>></c> in C# or <c>IEnumerable(Of IGrouping(Of TKey, TSource))</c> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] where each <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" /> object contains a collection of objects and a key.
trans-unit.target: C# 中的 IEnumerable<IGrouping<TKey、TSource>>或 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 中的 IEnumerable(Of IGrouping(Of TKey, TSource))，其中的每个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" /> 对象均包含一个对象集合和键<c></c><c></c>。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For examples of `GroupBy`, see the following topics.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例的`GroupBy`，请参阅以下主题。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29> method returns a collection of <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objects, one for each distinct key that was encountered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29>方法返回的集合<xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>对象，一个遇到每个非重复键。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> is an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> that also has a key associated with its elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>是<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>也具有一个其元素与关联的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objects are yielded in an order based on the order of the elements in `source` that produced the first key of each <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>对象都根据顺序中的元素的顺序生成`source`生成每个的第一个键<xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>。

trans-unit.source: Elements in a grouping are yielded in the order they appear in `source`.
trans-unit.target: 分组中的元素都在它们中出现的顺序生成`source`。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A> is used to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认相等比较器<xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>用于比较键。

trans-unit.source: If two keys are considered equal according to `comparer`, the first key is chosen as the key for that grouping.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个键都被视为等于根据`comparer`，第一个键被选为该分组的键。

trans-unit.source: In query expression syntax, a `group by` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Group By Into` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在查询表达式语法中， `group by` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Group By Into`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Groups the elements of a sequence according to a specified key selector function and creates a result value from each group and its key.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的键选择器函数对序列中的元素进行分组，并且从每个组及其键中创建结果值。

trans-unit.source: The keys are compared by using a specified comparer.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的比较器对键进行比较。

trans-unit.source: A collection of elements of type <paramref name="TResult" /> where each element represents a projection over a group and its key.
trans-unit.target: 类型为 <paramref name="TResult" /> 的元素的集合，其中的每个元素都表示对一个组及其键的投影。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the key returned by <c>keySelector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的键的类型<c>对</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements in each <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 每个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" /> 中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the result value returned by <c>resultSelector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的结果值的类型<c>resultSelector</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose elements to group.
trans-unit.target: 要对其元素进行分组的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the key for each element.
trans-unit.target: 用于提取每个元素的键的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to map each source element to an element in an <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于将每个源元素映射到 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" /> 中的元素的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to create a result value from each group.
trans-unit.target: 用于从每个组中创建结果值的函数。

trans-unit.source: Groups the elements of a sequence according to a specified key selector function and creates a result value from each group and its key.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的键选择器函数对序列中的元素进行分组，并且从每个组及其键中创建结果值。

trans-unit.source: The elements of each group are projected by using a specified function.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的函数对每个组的元素进行投影。

trans-unit.source: A collection of elements of type <paramref name="TResult" /> where each element represents a projection over a group and its key.
trans-unit.target: 类型为 <paramref name="TResult" /> 的元素的集合，其中的每个元素都表示对一个组及其键的投影。

trans-unit.source: In query expression syntax, a `group by` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Group By Into` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在查询表达式语法中， `group by` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Group By Into`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%604%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%602%7D%2C%60%603%7D%29> to group the projected elements of a sequence and then project a sequence of results of type `TResult`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%604%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%602%7D%2C%60%603%7D%29>进行分组的序列中的投影的元素和项目类型的结果的序列`TResult`。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the key returned by <c>keySelector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的键的类型<c>对</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements in each <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 每个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" /> 中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the result value returned by <c>resultSelector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的结果值的类型<c>resultSelector</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose elements to group.
trans-unit.target: 要对其元素进行分组的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the key for each element.
trans-unit.target: 用于提取每个元素的键的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to map each source element to an element in an <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于将每个源元素映射到 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" /> 中的元素的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to create a result value from each group.
trans-unit.target: 用于从每个组中创建结果值的函数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to compare keys with.
trans-unit.target: 用于对键进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Groups the elements of a sequence according to a specified key selector function and creates a result value from each group and its key.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的键选择器函数对序列中的元素进行分组，并且从每个组及其键中创建结果值。

trans-unit.source: Key values are compared by using a specified comparer, and the elements of each group are projected by using a specified function.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的比较器对键值进行比较，并且通过使用指定的函数对每个组的元素进行投影。

trans-unit.source: A collection of elements of type <paramref name="TResult" /> where each element represents a projection over a group and its key.
trans-unit.target: 类型为 <paramref name="TResult" /> 的元素的集合，其中的每个元素都表示对一个组及其键的投影。

trans-unit.source: Correlates the elements of two sequences based on key equality, and groups the results.
trans-unit.target: 基于键值等同性将两个序列的元素进行关联，并对结果进行分组。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第一个序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第二个序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the keys returned by the key selector functions.
trans-unit.target: 键选择器函数返回的键的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the result elements.
trans-unit.target: 结果元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The first sequence to join.
trans-unit.target: 要联接的第一个序列。

trans-unit.source: The sequence to join to the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 要与第一个序列联接的序列。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the join key from each element of the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 用于从第一个序列的每个元素提取联接键的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the join key from each element of the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 用于从第二个序列的每个元素提取联接键的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to create a result element from an element from the first sequence and a collection of matching elements from the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 用于从第一个序列的元素和第二个序列的匹配元素集合中创建结果元素的函数。

trans-unit.source: Correlates the elements of two sequences based on equality of keys and groups the results.
trans-unit.target: 基于键值等同性对两个序列的元素进行关联，并对结果进行分组。

trans-unit.source: The default equality comparer is used to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认的相等比较器对键进行比较。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains elements of type <paramref name="TResult" /> that are obtained by performing a grouped join on two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含通过对两个序列执行分组联接获得的类型为 <paramref name="TResult" /> 的元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The default equality comparer, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>, is used to hash and compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 默认的相等比较， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>，用于哈希处理和对键进行比较。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupJoin%2A> produces hierarchical results, which means that elements from `outer` are paired with collections of matching elements from `inner`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupJoin%2A> 产生分层结果，这意味着从元素`outer`的匹配元素的集合与配对`inner`。

trans-unit.source: `GroupJoin` enables you to base your results on a whole set of matches for each element of `outer`.
trans-unit.target: `GroupJoin` 可用于你的结果的基础的每个元素的匹配项的整个集`outer`。

trans-unit.source: If there are no correlated elements in `inner` for a given element of `outer`, the sequence of matches for that element will be empty but will still appear in the results.
trans-unit.target: 如果有在没有关联的元素`inner`给定元素的`outer`，则匹配该元素的序列将为空，但仍将显示在结果中。

trans-unit.source: The `resultSelector` function is called only one time for each `outer` element together with a collection of all the `inner` elements that match the `outer` element.
trans-unit.target: `resultSelector`函数调用一次每个`outer`元素与所有的集合一起`inner`相匹配的元素`outer`元素。

trans-unit.source: This differs from the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Join%2A> method, in which the result selector function is invoked on pairs that contain one element from `outer` and one element from `inner`.
trans-unit.target: 这不同于<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Join%2A>方法，在对，其中包含从一个元素调用结果选择器函数`outer`从一个元素和`inner`。

trans-unit.source: `GroupJoin` preserves the order of the elements of `outer`, and for each element of `outer`, the order of the matching elements from `inner`.
trans-unit.target: `GroupJoin` 保留的元素的顺序`outer`，和的每个元素`outer`，从匹配元素的顺序`inner`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupJoin%2A> has no direct equivalent in traditional relational database terms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupJoin%2A> 在传统的关系数据库术语中具有无直接等效项。

trans-unit.source: However, this method does implement a superset of inner joins and left outer joins.
trans-unit.target: 但是，此方法可实现内部联接和左外部联接的超集。

trans-unit.source: Both of these operations can be written in terms of a grouped join.
trans-unit.target: 这两种操作可以在已分组的联接方面编写。

trans-unit.source: See [Join Operations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[联接运算](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107)。

trans-unit.source: In query expression syntax, a `join … into` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Group Join` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupJoin%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在查询表达式语法中， `join … into` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Group Join`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupJoin%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%29> to perform a grouped join on two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%29>在两个序列上执行分组的联接。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="outer" /> 或 <paramref name="inner" /> 或 <paramref name="outerKeySelector" /> 或 <paramref name="innerKeySelector" /> 或 <paramref name="resultSelector" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> is used to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> 对键进行比较。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="outer" /> or <paramref name="inner" /> or <paramref name="outerKeySelector" /> or <paramref name="innerKeySelector" /> or <paramref name="resultSelector" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="outer" /> 或 <paramref name="inner" /> 或 <paramref name="outerKeySelector" /> 或 <paramref name="innerKeySelector" /> 或 <paramref name="resultSelector" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set intersection of two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 生成两个序列的交集。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose distinct elements that also appear in <c>second</c> will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 序列，其中的同时出现在第二个序列中的非重复元素将被返回<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose distinct elements that also appear in the first sequence will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 序列，其中的同时出现在第一个序列中的非重复元素将被返回。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set intersection of two sequences by using the default equality comparer to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用默认的相等比较器对值进行比较，生成两个序列的交集。

trans-unit.source: A sequence that contains the elements that form the set intersection of two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 包含组成两个序列交集的元素的序列。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two sets A and B is defined as the set that contains all the elements of A that also appear in B, but no other elements.
trans-unit.target: A 和 B 的两个集的交集定义为包含的同时出现在 B 中的所有元素，但没有其他元素的集。

trans-unit.source: When the object returned by this method is enumerated, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%2A> yields distinct elements occurring in both sequences in the order in which they appear in `first`.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回的对象枚举时，<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%2A>产生发生在这两个序列中出现的顺序中的非重复元素`first`。

trans-unit.source: The default equality comparer, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>, is used to compare values of the types that implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 默认的相等比较， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>，用于比较的类型的实现值<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601>泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> methods for the type.
trans-unit.target: 若要比较自定义数据类型，你需要实现此接口并提供你自己<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>和<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to return the elements that appear in each of two sequences of integers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>每两个整数的序列中返回显示的元素。

trans-unit.source: If you want to compare sequences of objects of a custom data type, you have to implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601> generic interface in a helper class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要比较的自定义数据类型的对象的序列，则必须实现<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601>帮助程序类中的泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and provide <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义数据类型中实现此接口，并提供<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>和<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%2A> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口后，你可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的对象<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%2A>方法，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="first" /> or <paramref name="second" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="first" /> 或 <paramref name="second" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose distinct elements that also appear in <c>second</c> will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 序列，其中的同时出现在第二个序列中的非重复元素将被返回<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose distinct elements that also appear in the first sequence will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 序列，其中的同时出现在第一个序列中的非重复元素将被返回。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 用于比较值的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set intersection of two sequences by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> 对值进行比较，生成两个序列的交集。

trans-unit.source: A sequence that contains the elements that form the set intersection of two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 包含组成两个序列交集的元素的序列。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two sets A and B is defined as the set that contains all the elements of A that also appear in B, but no other elements.
trans-unit.target: A 和 B 的两个集的交集定义为包含的同时出现在 B 中的所有元素，但没有其他元素的集。

trans-unit.source: When the object returned by this method is enumerated, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%2A> yields distinct elements occurring in both sequences in the order in which they appear in `first`.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回的对象枚举时，<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%2A>产生发生在这两个序列中出现的顺序中的非重复元素`first`。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>, is used to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认的相等比较， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>，用于比较值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement an equality comparer that can be used in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现可在将相等比较器<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you implement this comparer, you can use sequences of `Product` objects in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%2A> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 实现此比较器后，你可以使用的序列`Product`中的对象<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Intersect%2A>方法，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="first" /> 或 <paramref name="second" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Correlates the elements of two sequences based on matching keys.
trans-unit.target: 基于匹配键对两个序列的元素进行关联。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第一个序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第二个序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.target: 结果元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The first sequence to join.
trans-unit.target: 要联接的第一个序列。

trans-unit.source: The sequence to join to the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 要与第一个序列联接的序列。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the join key from each element of the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 用于从第一个序列的每个元素提取联接键的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the join key from each element of the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 用于从第二个序列的每个元素提取联接键的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to create a result element from two matching elements.
trans-unit.target: 用于从两个匹配元素创建结果元素的函数。

trans-unit.source: Correlates the elements of two sequences based on matching keys.
trans-unit.target: 基于匹配键对两个序列的元素进行关联。

trans-unit.source: The default equality comparer is used to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认的相等比较器对键进行比较。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that has elements of type <paramref name="TResult" /> that are obtained by performing an inner join on two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中包含通过对两个序列执行内部联接获得的、类型为 <paramref name="TResult" /> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The default equality comparer, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>, is used to hash and compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 默认的相等比较， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>，用于哈希处理和对键进行比较。

trans-unit.source: A join refers to the operation of correlating the elements of two sources of information based on a common key.
trans-unit.target: 联接是指相互关联的基于公用密钥信息的两个源元素的操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Join%2A> brings the two information sources and the keys by which they are matched together in one method call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Join%2A> 提供两个信息源以及依据它们相匹配在一个方法调用中的键。

trans-unit.source: This differs from the use of `SelectMany`, which requires more than one method call to perform the same operation.
trans-unit.target: 这不同于使用`SelectMany`，这要求多个方法调用，以便执行相同的操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Join%2A> preserves the order of the elements of `outer`, and for each of these elements, the order of the matching elements of `inner`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Join%2A> 保留的元素的顺序`outer`，以及对于每种这些元素，匹配元素的顺序`inner`。

trans-unit.source: In query expression syntax, a `join` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Join` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Join%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在查询表达式语法中， `join` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Join`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Join%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In relational database terms, the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Join%2A> method implements an inner equijoin.
trans-unit.target: 在关系数据库术语中，<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Join%2A>方法实现内部的同等联接。

trans-unit.source: 'Inner' means that only elements that have a match in the other sequence are included in the results.
trans-unit.target: 内部，则意味着，在结果中包含另一个序列中具有匹配项的元素。

trans-unit.source: An 'equijoin' is a join in which the keys are compared for equality.
trans-unit.target: 同等联接是一种联接中的键比较是否相等。

trans-unit.source: A left outer join operation has no dedicated standard query operator, but can be performed by using the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupJoin%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 左外部联接运算具有没有专用的标准查询运算符，但可以使用执行<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupJoin%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: See [Join Operations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[联接运算](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Join%60%604%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%603%7D%29> to perform an inner join of two sequences based on a common key.

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element of a sequence.

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element of a sequence.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Last%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method throws an exception if `source` contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Last%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法引发异常，如果`source`不包含任何元素。

trans-unit.source: To instead return a default value when the source sequence is empty, use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.LastOrDefault%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Last%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to return the last element of an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Last%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>返回数组的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The source sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 源序列为空。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return an element from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中返回元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试每个元素是否满足条件的函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element of a sequence that satisfies a specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中满足指定条件的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The last element in the sequence that passes the test in the specified predicate function.
trans-unit.target: 序列中通过指定谓词函数中的测试的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Last%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> method throws an exception if no matching element is found in `source`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Last%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>方法引发异常，如果在中不找到任何匹配元素`source`。

trans-unit.source: To instead return a default value when no matching element is found, use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.LastOrDefault%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要不找到任何匹配元素时返回默认值，使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.LastOrDefault%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Last%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> to return the last element of an array that satisfies a condition.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Last%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>返回数组中满足条件的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No element satisfies the condition in <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 元素均不满足 <paramref name="predicate" /> 中的条件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The source sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 源序列为空。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element of a sequence, or a default value if no element is found.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中的最后一个元素；如果未找到该元素，则返回默认值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return the last element of.
trans-unit.target: 要返回其最后一个元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element of a sequence, or a default value if the sequence contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中的最后一个元素；如果序列中不包含任何元素，则返回默认值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />) if the source sequence is empty; otherwise, the last element in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果源序列为空，则为 <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />)；否则为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 中的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 引用类型和可以为 null 的类型的默认值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.LastOrDefault%2A> method does not provide a way to specify a default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.LastOrDefault%2A>方法不提供任何方式来指定默认值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method as described in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定默认值以外`default(TSource)`，使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>示例部分中所述的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> on an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>上的空数组。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 有时的值`default(TSource)`不是你想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 而不是检查不需要的默认值的结果，然后将更改如有必要，你可以使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>方法，以指定你想要集合为空时使用的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Then, call <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Last%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to obtain the last element.
trans-unit.target: 然后，调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Last%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>若要获取最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric days of the month is empty.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用这两种方法来获取默认值为 1 的数字天的月份的集合是否为空。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any day of the month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead.
trans-unit.target: 由于输入一个整数默认值为 0，这不符合任何一天的月份，必须指定默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query has finished executing.
trans-unit.target: 后执行完查询后，检查第一个结果变量为不需要的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The second result variable is obtained by using <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> to specify a default value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用来获取第二个结果变量<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>指定默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 要从中返回元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试每个元素是否满足条件的函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element of a sequence that satisfies a condition or a default value if no such element is found.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中满足条件的最后一个元素；如果未找到这样的元素，则返回默认值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />) if the sequence is empty or if no elements pass the test in the predicate function; otherwise, the last element that passes the test in the predicate function.
trans-unit.target: 如果序列为空或没有元素通过谓词函数中的测试，则为 <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />)；否则，为通过谓词函数中的测试的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 引用类型和可以为 null 的类型的默认值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> by passing in a predicate.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>通过传入一个谓词。

trans-unit.source: In the second call to the method, there is no element in the sequence that satisfies the condition.
trans-unit.target: 对方法的第二个调用，在序列中满足条件中没有任何元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> that represents the number of elements in a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示序列中的元素数量的 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> that represents the total number of elements in a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示序列中元素总数的 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.target: 源序列中的元素数量。

trans-unit.source: Use this method rather than <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Count%2A> when you expect the result to be greater than <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法而非<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Count%2A>如果期望的结果必须晚于<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, an `Aggregate Into LongCount()` clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.LongCount%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: A sequence of values to determine the maximum value of.
trans-unit.target: 要确定其最大值的值序列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum value in a generic sequence.
trans-unit.target: 返回泛型序列中的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 序列中的最大值。

trans-unit.source: If type `TSource` implements <xref:System.IComparable%601>, the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Max%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method uses that implementation to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型`TSource`实现<xref:System.IComparable%601>、<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Max%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法使用该实现来比较值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if type `TSource` implements <xref:System.IComparable>, that implementation is used to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果类型`TSource`实现<xref:System.IComparable>，该实现用于比较值。

trans-unit.source: If `TSource` is a reference type and the source sequence is empty or contains only values that are `null`, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`TSource`是引用类型和源序列为空或包含只有值`null`，此方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.target: 要确定其最大值的值序列。

trans-unit.source: A transform function to apply to each element.
trans-unit.target: 应用于每个元素的转换函数。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a transform function on each element of a sequence and returns the maximum <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 对序列中的每个元素调用转换函数，并返回最大的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 序列中的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Max%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Decimal%7D%29> method uses the <xref:System.Decimal> implementation of <xref:System.IComparable%601> to compare values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Max%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Decimal%7D%29>方法使用<xref:System.Decimal>实现<xref:System.IComparable%601>值进行比较。

trans-unit.source: You can apply this method to a sequence of arbitrary values if you provide a function, `selector`, that projects the members of `source` into a numeric type, specifically <xref:System.Decimal>.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此方法应用于任意值的序列中，如果你提供一个函数， `selector`，项目的成员`source`为数值类型，具体而言<xref:System.Decimal>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 中不包含任何元素。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the value returned by <c>selector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值的类型<c>选择器</c>。

trans-unit.source: A sequence of values to determine the maximum value of.
trans-unit.target: 要确定其最大值的值序列。

trans-unit.source: A transform function to apply to each element.
trans-unit.target: 应用于每个元素的转换函数。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a transform function on each element of a generic sequence and returns the maximum resulting value.
trans-unit.target: 对序列中的每个元素调用转换函数，并返回最大结果值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 序列中的最大值。

trans-unit.source: If type `TResult` implements <xref:System.IComparable%601>, this method uses that implementation to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型`TResult`实现<xref:System.IComparable%601>，此方法使用该实现来比较值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if type `TResult` implements <xref:System.IComparable>, that implementation is used to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 否则为如果类型`TResult`实现<xref:System.IComparable>，该实现用于比较值。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, an `Aggregate Into Max()` clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Max%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Aggregate Into Max()`子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Max%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Max%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%7D%29>以确定序列中投影值的最大值。
