trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SelectMany%60%603%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%29> method is useful when you have to keep the elements of `source` in scope for query logic that occurs after the call to <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SelectMany%60%603%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%29>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SelectMany%60%603%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%29>时你需要的元素，方法会很有用`source`的调用后发生的查询逻辑的作用域中<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SelectMany%60%603%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%29>。

trans-unit.source: See the Example section for a code example.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参见“示例”部分。

trans-unit.source: If there is a bidirectional relationship between objects of type `TSource` and objects of type `TCollection`, that is, if an object of type `TCollection` provides a property to retrieve the `TSource` object that produced it, you do not need this overload of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SelectMany%60%603%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%29>.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型的对象之间没有双向关系`TSource`和类型的对象`TCollection`，即，如果类型的对象`TCollection`提供一个属性来检索`TSource`对象生成，则不需要这样做重载<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SelectMany%60%603%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%29>。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%29> and navigate back to the `TSource` object through the `TCollection` object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你可以使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%29>和向后定位到`TSource`对象通过`TCollection`对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="collectionSelector" /> or <paramref name="resultSelector" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" />、<paramref name="collectionSelector" /> 或 <paramref name="resultSelector" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two sequences are equal according to an equality comparer.
trans-unit.target: 根据相等比较器确定两个序列是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to compare to <c>second</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与第二个序列进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /><c></c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to compare to the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 要与第一个序列进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two sequences are equal by comparing the elements by using the default equality comparer for their type.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用相应类型的默认相等比较器对序列的元素进行比较，以确定两个序列是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two source sequences are of equal length and their corresponding elements are equal according to the default equality comparer for their type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果根据相应类型的默认相等比较器，两个源序列的长度相等，且其相应元素相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method enumerates the two source sequences in parallel and compares corresponding elements by using the default equality comparer for `TSource`, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法枚举并行的两个源序列并将相应的元素进行比较使用的默认相等比较器`TSource`， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default equality comparer, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>, is used to compare values of the types that implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 默认的相等比较， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>，用于比较的类型的实现值<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601>泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> methods for the type.
trans-unit.target: 若要比较自定义数据类型，你需要实现此接口并提供你自己<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>和<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code examples demonstrate how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to determine whether two sequences are equal.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>以确定两个序列是否相等。

trans-unit.source: In the first two examples, the method determines whether the compared sequences contain references to the same objects.
trans-unit.target: 在前两个示例中，该方法确定比较的序列是否包含对同一对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: In the third and fourth examples, the method compares the actual data of the objects within the sequences.
trans-unit.target: 在第三个和第四个示例中，该方法将序列中的对象的实际数据进行比较。

trans-unit.source: In this example the sequences are equal.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中序列相等。

trans-unit.source: The following code example compares two sequences that are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例比较不相等的两个序列。

trans-unit.source: Note that the sequences contain identical data, but because the objects that they contain have different references, the sequences are not considered equal.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，序列包含相同的数据，但它们包含的对象具有不同的引用，因为序列不会视为相等。

trans-unit.source: If you want to compare the actual data of the objects in the sequences instead of just comparing their references, you have to implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601> generic interface in your class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要比较的对象而不是只比较它们的引用与序列中的实际数据，则必须实现<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601>类中的泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a helper class and provide <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何在一个帮助器类中实现此接口，并提供<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>和<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口后，你可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的对象<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="first" /> or <paramref name="second" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="first" /> 或 <paramref name="second" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to compare to <c>second</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与第二个序列进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /><c></c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to compare to the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 要与第一个序列进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to use to compare elements.
trans-unit.target: 用于比较元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two sequences are equal by comparing their elements by using a specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> 来比较两个序列的元素，以确定这两个序列是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two source sequences are of equal length and their corresponding elements compare equal according to <paramref name="comparer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果根据 <paramref name="comparer" />，两个源序列的长度相等，且其相应元素相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> method enumerates the two source sequences in parallel and compares corresponding elements by using the specified <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法枚举并行的两个源序列并使用指定比较的相应元素<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601>。

trans-unit.source: If c`omparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>, is used to compare elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果`omparer`是`null`，默认的相等比较， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>，用于比较元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement an equality comparer that can be used in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现可在将相等比较器<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you implement this comparer, you can use sequences of `Product` objects in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 实现此比较器后，你可以使用的序列`Product`中的对象<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SequenceEqual%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="first" /> or <paramref name="second" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="first" /> 或 <paramref name="second" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single, specific element of a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中的单个特定元素。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return the single element of.
trans-unit.target: 要返回其单个元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the only element of a sequence, and throws an exception if there is not exactly one element in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列的唯一元素；如果该序列并非恰好包含一个元素，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The single element of the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列的单个元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method throws an exception if the input sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法引发异常，如果在输入的序列为空。

trans-unit.source: To instead return `null` when the input sequence is empty, use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要返回`null`输入的序列为空时，请使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to select the only element of an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>选择数组的唯一元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates that <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> throws an exception when the sequence does not contain exactly one element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>序列不包含的一个元素时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The input sequence contains more than one element.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列包含多个元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The input sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列为空。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return a single element from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中返回单个元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test an element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试元素是否满足条件的函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the only element of a sequence that satisfies a specified condition, and throws an exception if more than one such element exists.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中满足指定条件的唯一元素；如果有多个这样的元素存在，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The single element of the input sequence that satisfies a condition.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列中满足条件的单个元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> method throws an exception if the input sequence contains no matching element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>方法引发异常，如果在输入的序列不包含任何匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: To instead return `null` when no matching element is found, use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要返回`null`找到任何匹配元素时，使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> to select the only element of an array that satisfies a condition.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>选择数组中满足条件的唯一元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates that <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> throws an exception when the sequence does not contain exactly one element that satisfies the condition.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>序列不包含满足条件的一个元素时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No element satisfies the condition in <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 元素均不满足 <paramref name="predicate" /> 中的条件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: More than one element satisfies the condition in <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 多个元素满足 <paramref name="predicate" /> 中的条件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The source sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 源序列为空。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single, specific element of a sequence, or a default value if that element is not found.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中的单个特定元素；如果未找到该元素，则返回默认值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return the single element of.
trans-unit.target: 要返回其单个元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the only element of a sequence, or a default value if the sequence is empty; this method throws an exception if there is more than one element in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中的唯一元素；如果该序列为空，则返回默认值；如果该序列包含多个元素，此方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The single element of the input sequence, or <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />) if the sequence contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列中的单个元素；如果序列不包含任何元素，则为 <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />)。

trans-unit.source: The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 引用类型和可以为 null 的类型的默认值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%2A> method does not provide a way to specify a default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%2A>方法不提供任何方式来指定默认值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method as described in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定默认值以外`default(TSource)`，使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>示例部分中所述的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to select the only element of an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>选择数组的唯一元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates that <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> returns a default value when the sequence does not contain exactly one element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>序列不包含的一个元素时返回默认值。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 有时的值`default(TSource)`不是你想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 而不是检查不需要的默认值的结果，然后将更改如有必要，你可以使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>方法，以指定你想要集合为空时使用的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Then, call <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to obtain the element.
trans-unit.target: 然后，调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Single%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>若要获取的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of page numbers is empty.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用这两种方法来获取默认值为 1，页码的集合是否为空。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value for an integer is 0, which is not usually a valid page number, the default value must be specified as 1 instead.
trans-unit.target: 因为一个整数的默认值为 0，这通常不是有效的页面数必须指定默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query has finished executing.
trans-unit.target: 后执行完查询后，检查第一个结果变量为不需要的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The second result variable is obtained by using <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> to specify a default value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用来获取第二个结果变量<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>指定默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The input sequence contains more than one element.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列包含多个元素。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return a single element from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中返回单个元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test an element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试元素是否满足条件的函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the only element of a sequence that satisfies a specified condition or a default value if no such element exists; this method throws an exception if more than one element satisfies the condition.
trans-unit.target: 返回序列中满足指定条件的唯一元素；如果这类元素不存在，则返回默认值；如果有多个元素满足该条件，此方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The single element of the input sequence that satisfies the condition, or <see langword="default" />(<paramref name="TSource" />) if no such element is found.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列中满足条件的单个元素；如果未找到这类元素，则为 <see langword="default" /> (<paramref name="TSource" />)。

trans-unit.source: The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 引用类型和可以为 null 的类型的默认值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> to select the only element of an array that satisfies a condition.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>选择数组中满足条件的唯一元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates that <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> returns a default value when the sequence does not contain exactly one element that satisfies the condition.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>序列不包含满足条件的一个元素时返回默认值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: More than one element satisfies the condition in <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 多个元素满足 <paramref name="predicate" /> 中的条件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return elements from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中返回元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to skip before returning the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 返回剩余元素前要跳过的元素数量。

trans-unit.source: Bypasses a specified number of elements in a sequence and then returns the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 跳过序列中指定数量的元素，然后返回剩余的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains the elements that occur after the specified index in the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，包含输入序列中指定索引后出现的元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If `source` contains fewer than `count` elements, an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`source`少于`count`元素为一个空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>返回。

trans-unit.source: If `count` is less than or equal to zero, all elements of `source` are yielded.
trans-unit.target: 如果`count`小于或等于零的所有元素`source`都生成。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Take%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Skip%2A> methods are functional complements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Take%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Skip%2A>方法在功能上补充。

trans-unit.source: Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个序列`coll`和整数`n`，串联的结果`coll.Take(n)`和`coll.Skip(n)`生成同一序列作为`coll`。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Skip` clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Skip%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Skip`子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Skip%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Skip%2A> to skip a specified number of elements in a sorted array and return the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Skip%2A>以跳过指定的数量的已排序数组中的元素，并返回剩余元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Bypasses elements in a sequence as long as a specified condition is true and then returns the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的条件为 true，则跳过序列中的元素，然后返回剩余的元素。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return elements from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中返回元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试每个元素是否满足条件的函数。

trans-unit.source: Bypasses elements in a sequence as long as a specified condition is true and then returns the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的条件为 true，则跳过序列中的元素，然后返回剩余的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains the elements from the input sequence starting at the first element in the linear series that does not pass the test specified by <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，包含输入序列中的元素，该输入序列从线性系列中没有通过 <paramref name="predicate" /> 指定测试的第一个元素开始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可测试的每个元素`source`使用`predicate`并跳过的元素，如果结果为`true`。

trans-unit.source: After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`.
trans-unit.target: 将在谓词函数返回后`false`的元素，该元素和中的剩余元素`source`都生成的其他调用且`predicate`。

trans-unit.source: If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`predicate`返回`true`的所有元素在顺序中，一个空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>返回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A> methods are functional complements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A>方法在功能上补充。

trans-unit.source: Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个序列`coll`和一个纯函数`p`，串联的结果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`和`coll.SkipWhile(p)`生成同一序列作为`coll`。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Skip While`子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> to skip elements of an array as long as a condition is true.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>要跳过数组的元素，只要是 true 的条件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to return elements from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中返回元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each source element for a condition; the second parameter of the function represents the index of the source element.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试每个源元素是否满足条件的函数；该函数的第二个参数表示源元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: Bypasses elements in a sequence as long as a specified condition is true and then returns the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的条件为 true，则跳过序列中的元素，然后返回剩余的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element's index is used in the logic of the predicate function.
trans-unit.target: 将在谓词函数的逻辑中使用元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains the elements from the input sequence starting at the first element in the linear series that does not pass the test specified by <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，包含输入序列中的元素，该输入序列从线性系列中没有通过 <paramref name="predicate" /> 指定测试的第一个元素开始。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>方法进行测试的每个元素`source`使用`predicate`并跳过的元素，如果结果为`true`。

trans-unit.source: After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`.
trans-unit.target: 将在谓词函数返回后`false`的元素，该元素和中的剩余元素`source`都生成的其他调用且`predicate`。

trans-unit.source: If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`predicate`返回`true`的所有元素在顺序中，一个空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>返回。

trans-unit.source: The first argument of `predicate` represents the element to test.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数`predicate`表示要测试的元素。

trans-unit.source: The second argument represents the zero-based index of the element within `source`.
trans-unit.target: 第二个参数表示中的元素的从零开始索引`source`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A> methods are functional complements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A>方法在功能上补充。

trans-unit.source: Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个序列`coll`和一个纯函数`p`，串联的结果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`和`coll.SkipWhile(p)`生成同一序列作为`coll`。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Skip While`子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> to skip elements of an array as long as a condition that depends on the element's index is true.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>要跳过数组的元素，只要是 true 取决于元素的索引的条件。

trans-unit.source: You can apply this method to a sequence of arbitrary values if you provide a function, `selector`, that projects the members of `source` into a numeric type, specifically <xref:System.Decimal>.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此方法应用于任意值的序列中，如果你提供一个函数， `selector`，项目的成员`source`为数值类型，具体而言<xref:System.Decimal>。

trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The sequence to return elements from.
trans-unit.target: 要从其返回元素的序列。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的元素数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a specified number of contiguous elements from the start of a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 从序列的开头返回指定数量的相邻元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains the specified number of elements from the start of the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，包含输入序列开头的指定数量的元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Take%2A> enumerates `source` and yields elements until `count` elements have been yielded or `source` contains no more elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Take%2A> 枚举`source`和生成元素，直到`count`在生成的元素或`source`不包含任何更多的元素。

trans-unit.source: If `count` exceeds the number of elements in `source`, all elements of `source` are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`count`超过中的元素数`source`的所有元素`source`返回。

trans-unit.source: If `count` is less than or equal to zero, `source` is not enumerated and an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`count`小于或等于零，`source`不是枚举和空的<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>返回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Take%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Skip%2A> methods are functional complements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Take%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Skip%2A>方法在功能上补充。

trans-unit.source: Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个序列`coll`和整数`n`，串联的结果`coll.Take(n)`和`coll.Skip(n)`生成同一序列作为`coll`。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Take` clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Take%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Take`子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Take%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Take%2A> to return elements from the start of a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Take%2A>从序列的开头返回元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns elements from a sequence as long as a specified condition is true, and then skips the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的条件为 true，则返回序列中的元素，然后跳过剩余的元素。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: A sequence to return elements from.
trans-unit.target: 要从其返回元素的序列。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试每个元素是否满足条件的函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns elements from a sequence as long as a specified condition is true.
trans-unit.target: 只要指定的条件为 true，就会返回序列的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains the elements from the input sequence that occur before the element at which the test no longer passes.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，包含输入序列中出现在测试不再能够通过的元素之前的元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and yields the element if the result is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>方法进行测试的每个元素`source`使用`predicate`并生成元素，如果结果为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration stops when the predicate function returns `false` for an element or when `source` contains no more elements.
trans-unit.target: 当谓词函数返回时，将停止枚举`false`的元素时，或者当`source`不包含任何更多的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A> methods are functional complements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A>方法在功能上补充。

trans-unit.source: Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个序列`coll`和一个纯函数`p`，串联的结果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`和`coll.SkipWhile(p)`生成同一序列作为`coll`。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Take While` clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Take While`子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> to return elements from the start of a sequence as long as a condition is true.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>从序列的开头返回元素，只要是 true 的条件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The sequence to return elements from.
trans-unit.target: 要从其返回元素的序列。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each source element for a condition; the second parameter of the function represents the index of the source element.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试每个源元素是否满足条件的函数；该函数的第二个参数表示源元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns elements from a sequence as long as a specified condition is true.
trans-unit.target: 只要指定的条件为 true，就会返回序列的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element's index is used in the logic of the predicate function.
trans-unit.target: 将在谓词函数的逻辑中使用元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains elements from the input sequence that occur before the element at which the test no longer passes.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，包含输入序列中出现在测试不再能够通过的元素之前的元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and yields the element if the result is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>方法进行测试的每个元素`source`使用`predicate`并生成元素，如果结果为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration stops when the predicate function returns `false` for an element or when `source` contains no more elements.
trans-unit.target: 当谓词函数返回时，将停止枚举`false`的元素时，或者当`source`不包含任何更多的元素。

trans-unit.source: The first argument of `predicate` represents the element to test.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数`predicate`表示要测试的元素。

trans-unit.source: The second argument represents the zero-based index of the element within `source`.
trans-unit.target: 第二个参数表示中的元素的从零开始索引`source`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A> methods are functional complements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.SkipWhile%2A>方法在功能上补充。

trans-unit.source: Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个序列`coll`和一个纯函数`p`，串联的结果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`和`coll.SkipWhile(p)`生成同一序列作为`coll`。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Take While` clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查询表达式语法`Take While`子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> to return elements from the start of a sequence as long as a condition that uses the element's index is true.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.TakeWhile%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>从序列的开头返回元素，只要使用元素的索引条件为 true。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Performs a subsequent ordering of the elements in a sequence in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 按升序对序列中的元素执行后续排序。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the key returned by <c>keySelector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的键的类型<c>对</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable`1" /> that contains elements to sort.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含要排序的元素的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract a key from each element.
trans-unit.target: 用于从每个元素中提取键的函数。

trans-unit.source: Performs a subsequent ordering of the elements in a sequence in ascending order according to a key.
trans-unit.target: 根据某个键按升序对序列中的元素执行后续排序。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable`1" /> whose elements are sorted according to a key.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable`1" />，将根据键对其元素排序。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `Function(x) x` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for `keySelector`.
trans-unit.target: 若要按序列排序元素本身的值，请指定 identity 函数 (`x => x`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`Function(x) x`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 为`keySelector`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%2A> are defined to extend the type <xref:System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable%601>, which is also the return type of these methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A> 和<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%2A>被定义为扩展类型<xref:System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable%601>，这也是这些方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 这种设计，可通过将应用任意数量的指定多个排序条件<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable%601> inherits from <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>, you can call <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderBy%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderByDescending%2A> on the results of a call to <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderBy%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderByDescending%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable%601>继承自<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>，可以调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderBy%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderByDescending%2A>上调用的结果<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderBy%2A>， <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderByDescending%2A>，<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering.
trans-unit.target: 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。

trans-unit.source: This method compares keys by using the default comparer <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601.Default%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用默认比较器比较键<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601.Default%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行一个稳定排序;即当两个元素的键是否相等，如果元素的顺序会保留。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，系统不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: In query expression syntax, an `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在查询表达式语法中， `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%60%602%28System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%29> to perform a secondary ordering of the elements in a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%60%602%28System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%29>执行辅助排序的序列中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering.
trans-unit.target: 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A> 和<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%2A>被定义为扩展类型<xref:System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable%601>，这也是这些方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 这种设计，可通过将应用任意数量的指定多个排序条件<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable%601> inherits from <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>, you can call <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderBy%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderByDescending%2A> on the results of a call to <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderBy%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderByDescending%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable%601>继承自<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>，可以调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderBy%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderByDescending%2A>上调用的结果<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderBy%2A>， <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.OrderByDescending%2A>，<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenBy%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering.
trans-unit.target: 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601.Default%2A> is used to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认比较器<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Comparer%601.Default%2A>用于比较键。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行一个稳定排序;即当两个元素的键是否相等，如果元素的顺序会保留。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，系统不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%60%602%28System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29> to perform a secondary ordering of the elements in a sequence in descending order by using a custom comparer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ThenByDescending%60%602%28System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29>执行辅助序列中的元素的使用自定义比较器按降序排序。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="keySelector" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.target: 要从其创建数组的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 中创建数组。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the elements from the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含输入序列中的元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ToArray%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method forces immediate query evaluation and returns an array that contains the query results.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ToArray%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法强制直接查询计算并返回一个数组，包含查询结果。

trans-unit.source: You can append this method to your query in order to obtain a cached copy of the query results.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取查询结果的缓存的副本，可以将此方法追加到你的查询。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ToList%2A> has similar behavior but returns a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> instead of an array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ToList%2A> 具有类似的行为，但返回<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>而不是数组。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ToArray%2A> to force immediate query evaluation and return an array of results.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ToArray%2A>强制直接查询计算并返回结果的数组。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 用于比较键的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Linq.Lookup`2" /> from an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> according to a specified key selector function and key comparer.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的键选择器函数和键比较器，从 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Lookup`2" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Linq.Lookup`2" /> that contains keys and values.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含键和值的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Lookup`2" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ToLookup%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29> method returns a <xref:System.Linq.Lookup%602>, a one-to-many dictionary that maps keys to collections of values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.ToLookup%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29>方法返回<xref:System.Linq.Lookup%602>，一个一到多字典，其中键映射到值的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Linq.Lookup%602> is different to a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>, which performs a one-to-one mapping of keys to single values.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Linq.Lookup%602>不同于<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>，这将执行键到单个值的一对一映射。

trans-unit.source: If `comparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A> is used to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认相等比较器<xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>用于比较键。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set union of two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 生成两个序列的并集。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose distinct elements form the first set for the union.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中的非重复元素构成并集的第一个部分。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose distinct elements form the second set for the union.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中的非重复元素构成并集的第二个部分。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set union of two sequences by using the default equality comparer.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用默认的相等比较器，生成两个序列的并集。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains the elements from both input sequences, excluding duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 一个 包含两个输入序列中的非重复元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This method excludes duplicates from the return set.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从结果集中排除重复项。

trans-unit.source: This is different behavior to the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Concat%2A> method, which returns all the elements in the input sequences including duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 这是到不同的行为<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Concat%2A>方法，包括重复项的输入序列中返回的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: The default equality comparer, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>, is used to compare values of the types that implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601> generic interface.
trans-unit.target: 默认的相等比较， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>，用于比较的类型的实现值<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601>泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> methods for the type.
trans-unit.target: 若要比较自定义数据类型，你需要实现此接口并提供你自己<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>和<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: When the object returned by this method is enumerated, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A> enumerates `first` and `second` in that order and yields each element that has not already been yielded.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回的对象枚举时，<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A>枚举`first`和`second`按此顺序并生成尚未生成每个元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to obtain the union of two sequences of integers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>以获取两个整数的序列的并集。

trans-unit.source: If you want to compare sequences of objects of a custom data type, you have to implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601> generic interface in a helperclass.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要比较的自定义数据类型的对象的序列，则必须实现<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%601>helperclass 中的泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and provide <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义数据类型中实现此接口，并提供<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>和<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口后，你可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的对象<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="first" /> or <paramref name="second" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="first" /> 或 <paramref name="second" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 输入序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose distinct elements form the first set for the union.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中的非重复元素构成并集的第一个部分。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose distinct elements form the second set for the union.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其中的非重复元素构成并集的第二个部分。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 用于比较值的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set union of two sequences by using a specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> 生成两个序列的并集。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains the elements from both input sequences, excluding duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 一个 包含两个输入序列中的非重复元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If c`omparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>, is used to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 如果`omparer`是`null`，默认的相等比较， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer%601.Default%2A>，用于比较值。

trans-unit.source: When the object returned by this method is enumerated, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A> enumerates `first` and `second` in that order and yields each element that has not already been yielded.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回的对象枚举时，<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A>枚举`first`和`second`按此顺序并生成尚未生成每个元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Concat%2A> method differs from the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A> method because the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Concat%2A> method returns all the elements in the input sequences including duplicates, whereas <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A> returns only unique values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Concat%2A>方法不同于<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A>方法因为<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Concat%2A>方法返回的所有元素序列中的输入包括重复项，而<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A>都返回唯一值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement an equality comparer that can be used in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现可在将相等比较器<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you implement this comparer, you can use sequences of `Product` objects in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 实现此比较器后，你可以使用的序列`Product`中的对象<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Union%2A>方法，如下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: Filters a sequence of values based on a predicate.
trans-unit.target: 基于谓词筛选值序列。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to filter.
trans-unit.target: 要筛选的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试每个元素是否满足条件的函数。

trans-unit.source: Filters a sequence of values based on a predicate.
trans-unit.target: 基于谓词筛选值序列。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In query expression syntax, a `where` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Where` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Where%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>.
trans-unit.target: 在查询表达式语法中， `where` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Where`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句转换为的调用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Where%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Where%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> to filter a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Where%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>筛选序列。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 元素的类型<c>源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> to filter.
trans-unit.target: 要筛选的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each source element for a condition; the second parameter of the function represents the index of the source element.
trans-unit.target: 用于测试每个源元素是否满足条件的函数；该函数的第二个参数表示源元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: Filters a sequence of values based on a predicate.
trans-unit.target: 基于谓词筛选值序列。

trans-unit.source: Each element's index is used in the logic of the predicate function.
trans-unit.target: 将在谓词函数的逻辑中使用每个元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains elements from the input sequence that satisfy the condition.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含输入序列中满足条件的元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The first argument of `predicate` represents the element to test.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数`predicate`表示要测试的元素。

trans-unit.source: The second argument represents the zero-based index of the element within `source`.
trans-unit.target: 第二个参数表示中的元素的从零开始索引`source`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Where%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29> to filter a sequence based on a predicate that involves the index of each element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Where%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%29>筛选序列基于一个谓词，涉及的每个元素的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the first input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第一个输入序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the second input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第二个输入序列中的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the result sequence.
trans-unit.target: 结果序列的元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The first sequence to merge.
trans-unit.target: 要合并的第一个序列。

trans-unit.source: The second sequence to merge.
trans-unit.target: 要合并的第二个序列。

trans-unit.source: A function that specifies how to merge the elements from the two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定如何合并这两个序列中的元素的函数。

trans-unit.source: Applies a specified function to the corresponding elements of two sequences, producing a sequence of the results.
trans-unit.target: 将指定函数应用于两个序列的对应元素，以生成结果序列。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> that contains merged elements of two input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含两个输入序列中的合并元素的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by using deferred execution.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。

trans-unit.source: The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 方法将合并第一个序列的每个的元素与第二个序列中具有相同的索引的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them.
trans-unit.target: 如果序列不具有相同数量的元素，该方法将序列合并直到到达其中之一的结尾。

trans-unit.source: For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the result sequence will have only three elements.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一个序列具有三个元素，并且另一个具有四个，则结果序列需要仅三个元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Zip%2A> method to merge two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Zip%2A>方法以合并两个序列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="first" /> or <paramref name="second" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="first" /> 或 <paramref name="second" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。
